content: goomy final piece should measure approximately 6 tall difficulty medium this is an icrochetthings original pattern © 2014-2016 do not claim as your own do not copy sell or distribute this double_crochet = double_crochet ▪ treble_crochet = triple crochet ▪ f/o = finish off ▪ = repeat ▪ = total number of stitches per row/ round ▪ underlined = work in the same stitch © icrochetthings
